detectors.description: List of Misti detectors to run, each potentially defined by a path and always by a class name. Built-in detectors don't have a path.

modulePath.description: The file path of the detector module

className.description: The class name of the detector

position.description: The position of the suppression in the format 'fileName:line:column'

ignoredProjects.description: List of Tact projects that will be ignored by the analyzer

soufflePath.description: Directory to save generated Souffl√© files. If not set, a temporary directory will be used.

tactStdlibPath.description: Path to Tact standard library. If not set, the default stdlib from the actual Tact setup will be used.

unusedPrefix.description: Identifiers starting with this prefix won't be reported as unused by built-in detectors.

verbosity.description: Verbosity level of the logs output by the system.
